manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_yhc_onenavi`; CREATE TABLE `ims_yhc_onenavi` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标题', `lat` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '坐标经度', `lng` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '坐标维度', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `rid` (`rid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
